availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William P. Perkins (Washington County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Perkins Perkins in Madison County, Kentucky, in December 1837. Father of Joseph Perkins, Elby Perkins, Nancy Perkins, Mary Perkins, and Drucilla Perkins. Farmer in Washington County in 1850. Farmer in Washington County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, p. 166B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, District No. 1, p. 183.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 000183312.
"William P. Perkins (1815-1892)," Find A Grave, Memorial 111296736, accessed November 29, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/111296736.
